Title.description: The title of the video script.

Summary.description: A summary of the video script.

CharacterPrompt.description: A prompt to generate the image of the character that will appear throughout the video.

MusicPrompt.description: A prompt to generate the background music for the video.

Segments.description: An array of segments for the video script.

Script.description: The script to be read by the narrator for this segment.

NarrationType.description: Type of narration for this segment.

UseNarrationAudio.description: Whether to use narration audio for this segment.

ImagePrompts.description: Image prompts that will be used to generate images for this segment.

items.description: Image prompt to instruct the AI image generator to generate an image depicting the scene described in the script.

VideoPrompt.description: Prompt or description for the video content for this segment.
